logistic.R: Automation, governance, and activation-matrix backlog required to embed Metaquest into the UTAC system spine.
logistic.Theta: Parity brief + UTAC status matrix entries refreshed within 24h and echoed in codexfeedback (pr-draft-0110).
logistic.zeta: Damped when BreakPoint rituals precede automation work, indices refresh without drift, and activation-matrix hooks close each sprint.

orientation.purpose: Provide a quick map of how Metaquest plugs into indices, activation telemetry, automation scripts, and governance controls.

alignment.description: Bridge dashboard aligning system + campaign checkpoints.
Deep system beacon describing assets, gaps, and implementation lattice.
Activation ledger translating August 2026 UTAC tracker signals into backlog tasks.

lanterns.title: UTAC Status Matrix
lanterns.resonance_role: Tracks readiness gaps, ΔAIC guards, and parity checkpoints for Metaquest.

notes.logistic_coupling: When R grows, consult the matrix before executing automation to keep β disciplined.

lanterns.title: Metaquest Parity Brief
lanterns.resonance_role: Provides Θ guardrails for telemetry, simulator demos, endorsements, and codex echoes.

notes.logistic_coupling: Any automation change must log mq-parity-001…004 status before merge.

lanterns.title: BreakPoint Rituals
lanterns.resonance_role: WayToGo & ReaktionWayToGo damp ζ(R) by scripting restart paths and escalation cues.

notes.logistic_coupling: Run rituals before modifying automation to anchor recovery options.

lanterns.title: Automation Hooks
lanterns.resonance_role: Index + sigillin hygiene ensuring Ordnungs-Sigillin stay in phase with Metaquest assets.

notes.logistic_coupling: Invoke dry-run before parity updates; document results in codex.

lanterns.title: Codex Feedback Ledger
lanterns.resonance_role: Maintains tri-layer memory of Metaquest system actions and mq-sys gap progression.

notes.logistic_coupling: Every compass update demands codex entry referencing mq-sys-gap ids.

lanterns.title: Shadow Compass Coupling
lanterns.resonance_role: Provides mirrored risks and recovery scripts to guard against automation drift.

notes.logistic_coupling: Review before introducing new automation to anticipate failure thresholds.

lanterns.title: Activation Matrix Bridge
lanterns.resonance_role: Carries August 2026 activation telemetry into compass/index updates and codex echoes.

notes.logistic_coupling: Matrix refresh requires mirrored timestamps in compass, index, UTAC tracker, and codex within one sprint.

pending_vectors.description: Run `scripts/sigillin_sync.py` telemetry exports and document the timestamp propagation plan.

guardrails.Theta: Telemetry timestamp published with each sprint and mirrored in bridge + compass.
guardrails.null_model: Telemetry missing → automation freeze + mq-sys-shadow alert.

pending_vectors.notes: Telemetry run recorded; automation to push timestamp into compasses/bridge pending.

pending_vectors.description: Establish CI/Nox guard (`make preset-guard` or similar) to verify index parity after Metaquest changes.

guardrails.Theta: CI job compares indices vs. sigil directories on every PR touching Metaquest assets.
guardrails.null_model: Index drift passes unnoticed and triggers mq-bridge-shadow-003.

pending_vectors.notes: CI guard not yet wired; backlog row index-recount-hook tracks next steps.

pending_vectors.description: Backfill system compass narrative with ΔAIC/null comparisons for Metaquest automation vs. baseline.

guardrails.Theta: Compass lists null automation scenario and cites ΔAIC improvements.
guardrails.null_model: Automation changes proceed without falsifiability check.

pending_vectors.notes: Null comparison narrative missing; link to backlog + codex once drafted.

pending_vectors.description: Embed UTAC backlog row references + mq-gap ids into compass tri-layer and codex updates.

guardrails.Theta: Compass lists backlog rows + mq-gap ids within 24h of backlog change
guardrails.null_model: Backlog delta invisible to compass; triggers mq-bridge-shadow-003.

pending_vectors.notes: New backlog gap mq-bridge-gap-006 requires explicit referencing from system compass.

pending_vectors.description: Mirror activation-matrix timestamp + codex ID across compass, index, UTAC tracker, and shadow beacons.

guardrails.Theta: Activation matrix refresh echoed in compass + index within one sprint.
guardrails.null_model: Activation matrix drifts from tracker, triggering mq-bridge-shadow-005.

pending_vectors.notes: August 2026 matrix refresh landed; compass/index propagation pending automation.

activation_hooks.response: Refresh compass tri-layer, propagate mq-sys-gap status, log codex entry, ping shadow compass.
Record timestamp in compass + bridge, confirm indices refreshed, cite UTAC matrix.
Propagate timestamp + codex id to compass/index/codex and notify shadow compass + UTAC tracker.
Consult shadow compass, rerun BreakPoint ritual, document remediation before resuming.

null_model.description: Metaquest automation evolves without parity brief checkpoints or codex echoes.
risks: Indices drift and navigation fails before launch freeze.
Telemetry timestamps diverge from campaign narrative, eroding trust.
Shadow alerts trigger late, forcing emergency remediation.
